summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Building Department; continuing certain temporary positions in connection with the extension of the Federally Assisted Code Enforcement (F.A.C.E.) Program through December 31, 1974, increasing the expenditure allowance for Object of Expenditure "1000 Personal Services" in Program Category "Housing Conservation" (230) in the 1974 Budget of said Department, making a reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor.
